definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: I expected it to be a cakewalk anyway.
sentences.chinese: 我期望这是一个步态竞赛反正。

sentences.english: Lower limb exoskeleton orthosis was used as rehabilitation device in gait training.
sentences.chinese: 设计用于步态康复训练的下肢外骨骼矫形器。

sentences.english: First, the control system architecture of obstacle avoidance and the basic walking gait algorithms are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了避障控制系统的体系结构和基本步态算法。

sentences.english: The work enabled artists to correct the gait of their equine subjects.
sentences.chinese: 艺术家们借助这一成果纠正了他们作品中马的步态。

sentences.english: The foot pushes off evenly at the end of the gait cycle with mild pronation.
sentences.chinese: 足部推动小康均匀，在去年底的步态周期轻旋。

sentences.english: A book called Animal Locomotion collected 781 of these plates.
sentences.chinese: 《动物步态》一书收集了781幅类似的照片。

sentences.english: The period-doubling and chaotic gaits of passive dynamic walking have been analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 得到了斜面倾角增大时样机的倍周期步态。

sentences.english: Because of his wide body and short legs he tends to roll slightly.
sentences.chinese: 由于身躯较宽，且腿比较短，所以步态略呈滚动状。

sentences.english: They ensure the proper impulsion and determine the dog's characteristic gait.
sentences.chinese: 他们确保适当的冲动，并确定狗的步态特征。

sentences.english: The trotting gait of the Shetland Sheepdog should denote effortless speed and smoothness.
sentences.chinese: 喜乐蒂牧羊犬的小跑步态显得轻松而顺畅。

sentences.english: Each of them has a different stride and a unique expression.
sentences.chinese: 他们每个人有不同的步态，有独特的表情。

sentences.english: He is awkward in his gait.
Typical quadruped gaits were produced by using different weight matrixes.
sentences.chinese: 采用不同的权重矩阵得到四足机器人的典型步态。

sentences.english: Very low riding skill you won't be able to use all gaits .
sentences.chinese: 非常低的骑马技巧，你将无法使用所有步态。

sentences.english: Results Dogs with tibial torsional deformity changed their gaits obviously.
sentences.chinese: 结果胫骨扭转畸形者步态明显改变。

definition: cat-like gait/sashaying gait of a catwalk model
to bow/to bend at the waist
